items.prompt: Identify and correct the dilution error in this protocol.
items.response: Use 1:10 dilution instead of 1:100 at step 4.

items.prompt: Revise the protocol to remove ambiguity in incubation step.
items.response: Incubate at 37C for exactly 30 minutes before wash.
items.reference: Specify exact incubation temperature and duration.
